Original Sample: Honey, you know I can not do that, ” I lay my hand on her head, gently caressing her thin blond hair.    “ It is against the law and we don ’ t want to mess with the law do we now sweety? ”  Her big blue eyes meet mine.   “ But dad, the teacher tells us to think! He says it makes you smarter. I wan na get smarter daddy, ” She clamps onto my leg in an effort to give her what she wants. Usually it works, but I can not give in now.   “ Then that teacher is a fool. ”   I don ’ t like to rely on personal attacks, but I have to make her understand. It is for her safety.   “ Thinking is dangerous. I already told you to just go with the flow. There is no need for thinking. Others will make you smart. ”   Although the words leave my mouth, they aren ’ t actually mine. I've already been led astray. She might still hold a chance.   “ The others are stupid! ” Her voice has a tone of protest, which is a bad sign.   “ Please honey don ’ t you trust your own father? ” I lift her up, trying to please her.   “ Lem me go! ” She is wriggling in my arms.   “ Listen to me now, ” my arms bring her back to the ground, “ forget what the teacher said. ” I kneel and begin to whisper.   “ Thinking is not something the people approve of dear, ” I nervously look around, checking the inside of my own house. Nowhere is safe, especially not your home.  “ So you better keep for from it, even when it's day time it is best not to think too much, do you understand? ” I try to sound as serious as I can.   She glances at her feet, not sure what to answer.   “ No. ”   She must ’ ve been thinking about why she isn ’ t allowed to think. Damn I should ’ ve disabled her thoughts before I told her all this. I can ’ t disable it now without avoiding questions tomorrow. I ’ m such an idiot.   I let out a sigh.   Crap now I ’ m thinking as well. Better get this over quickly.   “ You don ’ t need to understand why, you need to just accept, ” I elaborated.   “ When you can just accept, you do not need to think. It makes for a much more relaxed life. ”  She just nodded.   I can ’ t believe I ’ ve been forced by this teacher to use such lies. Now that she showed a bit of understanding I turn of her ability to think.   “ Alright then, off you go to bed! ” And as I push her upstairs, I hear the doorbell.   My heart stops for a second. I see Katy hesitate on the stairs. I tell her I love her and gesture her to move on. She follows my order without questioning and for the first time in my life, I thank the government for thought manipulation.  The noise at the door gets louder. I wipe a tear from my face and aim my attention at the door.   “ Yes yes, I ’ ll be right there, ” I take the keys and take a deep breath. I knew it would be inevitable, but I had never thought that a stupid teacher would be the cause.   Running is n't an option. It never was.   I open the door and immediately I get thrown on the ground. I get cuffed as if I'm a serious criminal. Three policemen hold me in my place, until one of them yells in my ear.   “ You are under arrest for unauthorized use of the thoughts system and suspect for rebellion. Anything you say can and will be used against you. ”   It didn ’ t matter to speak now, or later. I will be convicted all the same.    We are going to shut your thinking down now.    And they do. All of them...
